data.name: ArraySizeMustBeSpecified
data.value: Marshalling an array from unmanaged to managed requires either the 'SizeParamIndex' or 'SizeConst' fields to be set on a 'MarshalAsAttribute' or the 'ConstantElementCount' or 'CountElementName' properties to be set on a 'MarshalUsingAttribute'.

data.name: CollectionSizeParamTypeMustBeIntegral
data.value: The specified collection size parameter for an collection must be an integer type. If the size information is applied to a nested collection, the size parameter must be a collection of one less level of nesting with an integral element.

data.name: GraphHasCycles
data.value: The provided graph has cycles and cannot be topologically sorted.

data.name: InAttributeOnlyIsDefault
data.value: The '[In]' attribute is not necessary unless the '[Out]' attribute is also used. The behavior of the '[In]' attribute without the '[Out]' attribute is the same as the default behavior.

data.name: InOutAttributeByRefNotSupported
data.value: The '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes are unsupported on parameters passed by reference. Use the 'in', 'ref', or 'out' keywords instead.

data.name: InOutAttributeMarshalerNotSupported
data.value: The provided '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes on this parameter are unsupported on this parameter.

data.name: MarshallingBoolAsUndefinedNotSupported
data.value: Marshalling bool without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify either 'MarshalUsingAttribute' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.

data.name: MarshallingCharAsSpecifiedStringMarshallingNotSupported
data.value: Marshalling char with 'StringMarshalling.{0}' is not supported. Instead, manually convert the char type to the desired byte representation and pass to the source-generated P/Invoke.

data.name: MarshallingStringOrCharAsUndefinedNotSupported
data.value: Marshalling string or char without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify '{0}.StringMarshalling', '{0}.StringMarshallingCustomType', 'MarshalUsingAttribute' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.

data.name: CyclicalCountInfo
data.value: This element cannot depend on '{0}' for collection size information without creating a dependency cycle

data.name: DuplicateCountInfo
data.value: Count information for a given element at a given indirection level can only be specified once

data.name: DuplicateMarshallingInfo
data.value: Multiple marshalling attributes per element per indirection level is unsupported, but duplicate information was provided for indirection level {0}

data.name: ExtraneousMarshallingInfo
data.value: Marshalling info was specified for 'ElementIndirectionDepth' {0}, but marshalling info was only needed for {1} level(s) of indirection

data.name: ConstantAndElementCountInfoDisallowed
data.value: Only one of 'ConstantElementCount' or 'ElementCountInfo' may be used in a 'MarshalUsingAttribute' for a given 'ElementIndirectionDepth'

data.name: RuntimeMarshallingMustBeDisabled
data.value: Runtime marshalling must be disabled in this project by applying the 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute' to the assembly to enable marshalling this type.

data.name: MarshallingCharAsStringMarshallingCustomNotSupported
data.value: Marshalling char with 'StringMarshalling.Custom' is not supported. To use a custom type marshaller, specify 'MarshalUsingAttribute'.

data.name: BidirectionalMissingRequiredMarshaller
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from managed to unmanaged and unmanaged to managed, but the marshaller type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: ManagedToUnmanagedMissingRequiredMarshaller
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from managed to unmanaged, but the marshaller type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: UnmanagedToManagedMissingRequiredMarshaller
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from unmanaged to managed, but the marshaller type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeStaticClassOrStruct
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a static class or a struct.

data.name: MarshallerEntryPointTypeMustMatchArity
data.value: The marshaller entry point type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must have an arity of one greater than the managed type.

data.name: MarshallerInNativeReturnPositionMustMatchNativeReturnType
data.value: All marshallers for values that are passed as the unmanaged return value must have the same unmanaged type.

data.name: ContainingTypeAccessibilityDetails
data.value: Containing type '{0}' has accessibility '{1}'.

data.name: TypeAccessibilityDetails
data.value: '{0}' has accessibility '{1}'.

data.name: InAttributeNotSupportedWithoutOutBlittableArray
data.value: The '[In]' attribute is not supported unless the '[Out]' attribute is also used. Blittable arrays cannot be marshalled as '[In]' only.

data.name: AddGeneratedComClassAddUnsafe
data.value: Add 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' to enable passing objects of this type to COM and allow unsafe code

data.name: AddGeneratedComClassAttributeDescription
data.value: This type implements at least one type with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' attribute. Add the 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' to enable passing this type to COM and exposing the COM interfaces for the types with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' from objects of this type.

data.name: AddGeneratedComClassAttributeMessage
data.value: Add the 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' to '{0}' to enable passing objects of type '{0}' to COM

data.name: AddGeneratedComClassAttributeTitle
data.value: Add 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' to enable passing objects of this type to COM

data.name: AddMissingCustomTypeMarshallerMembers
data.value: Add missing custom type marshaller members

data.name: AnalysisFailedDescription
data.value: The analysis required to generate code for this interface or method has failed due to an unexpected code pattern. If you are using new or unconventional syntax, consider using other syntax.

data.name: AnalysisFailedInterfaceMessage
data.value: Analysis of interface '{0}' has failed. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate code for this interface.

data.name: AnalysisFailedMethodMessage
data.value: Analysis of method '{0}' has failed. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate code for this method.

data.name: AnalysisFailedTitle
data.value: Analysis for COM interface generation has failed.

data.name: BaseInterfaceCannotBeGeneratedDescription
data.value: COM interface source generation requires all base COM interfaces to be valid interfaces. Fix any issues on the base interface to resolve this diagnostic.

data.name: BaseInterfaceCannotBeGeneratedMessage
data.value: COM interface {0} inherits from {1}, which has errors. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate source for {0}.

data.name: BaseInterfaceCannotBeGeneratedTitle
data.value: The base COM interface failed to generate source. Code will not be generated for this interface.

data.name: BaseInterfaceMustGenerateAtLeastSameWrappers
data.value: A 'GeneratedComInterface' cannot specify 'ComInterfaceOptions.ManagedObjectWrapper' or 'ComInterfaceOptions.ComObjectWrapper' unless the base interface type did not specify options or specified at least the same options.

data.name: CallerAllocFromManagedMustHaveBufferSizeDescription
data.value: When the 'Managed to Unmanaged with Caller-Allocated Buffer' shape is used by providing a 'FromManaged' method that takes a 'Span<T>' on the marshaller type, the type must provide a static 'BufferSize' property to provide the number of elements in the caller-allocated buffer.

data.name: CallerAllocFromManagedMustHaveBufferSizeMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' must have a static read-only 'int' 'BufferSize' property to specify the size of the caller-allocated buffer because it has a FromManaged method that takes a caller-allocated 'Span<{1}>'

data.name: CannotForwardToDllImportDescription
data.value: The generated 'DllImportAttribute' will not have a value corresponding to '{0}'.

data.name: CannotForwardToDllImportMessage
data.value: '{0}' has no equivalent in 'DllImportAttribute' and will not be forwarded

data.name: CannotForwardToDllImportTitle
data.value: Specified 'LibraryImportAttribute' arguments cannot be forwarded to 'DllImportAttribute'

data.name: CastsBetweenRuntimeComAndSourceGeneratedComNotSupportedDescription
data.value: Casting between a 'ComImport' type and a source-generated COM type is not supported and will fail at runtime

data.name: CastsBetweenRuntimeComAndSourceGeneratedComNotSupportedMessage
data.value: Casting between a 'ComImport' type and a source-generated COM type is not supported

data.name: CastsBetweenRuntimeComAndSourceGeneratedComNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Casting between a 'ComImport' type and a source-generated COM type is not supported

data.name: ClassDoesNotImplementAnyGeneratedComInterfacesDescription
data.value: A class with 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' must implement at least one interface with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' or else the generated code with not have an effect.

data.name: ClassDoesNotImplementAnyGeneratedComInterfacesMessage
data.value: Class '{0}' with 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' does not implement any interfaces with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'. Source will not be generated for '{0}'.

data.name: ComHostingDoesNotSupportGeneratedComInterfaceDescription
data.value: .NET COM hosting with 'EnableComHosting' only supports built-in COM interop. It does not support source-generated COM interop with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'.

data.name: ComHostingDoesNotSupportGeneratedComInterfaceMessage
data.value: .NET COM hosting with 'EnableComHosting' does not support interfaces with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'. Change any COM exposed interfaces implemented by '{0}' to use the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute' instead

data.name: ComHostingDoesNotSupportGeneratedComInterfaceTitle
data.value: .NET COM hosting with 'EnableComHosting' does not support interfaces with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedDescriptionLibraryImport
data.value: Source-generated P/Invokes will ignore any configuration that is not supported.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedDescriptionCom
data.value: Source-generated COM will ignore any configuration that is not supported.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageLibraryImport
data.value: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageCom
data.value: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageMarshallingInfoLibraryImport
data.value: The specified marshalling configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. {0}.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageMarshallingInfoCom
data.value: The specified marshalling configuration is not supported by source-generated COM. {0}.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageParameterLibraryImport
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageParameterCom
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageReturnLibraryImport
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageReturnCom
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageValueLibraryImport
data.value: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified value is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageValueCom
data.value: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedTitleLibraryImport
data.value: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedTitleCom
data.value: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated COM.

data.name: ConvertComInterfaceMayProduceInvalidCode
data.value: Converting this interface to use 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' may produce invalid code and may require additional work

data.name: ConvertNoPreserveSigDllImportToGeneratedMayProduceInvalidCode
data.value: Automatically converting a P/Invoke with 'PreserveSig' set to 'false' to a source-generated P/Invoke may produce invalid code

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedComInterfaceAddUnsafe
data.value: Convert to 'GeneratedComInterface' and allow unsafe code

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedComInterfaceDescription
data.value: Use 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' instead of 'ComImportAttribute' to generate COM marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedComInterfaceMayRequireCustomMarshalling
data.value: Converting this API to 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' will require additional code to provide custom marshallers for some parameters.

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedComInterfaceMessage
data.value: Mark the type '{0}' with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' instead of 'ComImportAttribute' to generate COM marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToGeneratedComInterfaceTitle
data.value: Convert to 'GeneratedComInterface'

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImport
data.value: Convert to 'LibraryImport'

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportAddUnsafe
data.value: Convert to 'LibraryImport' and enable unsafe code

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportDescription
data.value: Use 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportMayRequireCustomMarshalling
data.value: Converting this API to 'LibraryImport' will require additional code to provide custom marshallers for some parameters.

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportMessage
data.value: Mark the method '{0}' with 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportTitle
data.value: Use 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportWithSuffix
data.value: Convert to 'LibraryImport' with '{0}' suffix

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportWithSuffixAddUnsafe
data.value: Convert to 'LibraryImport' with '{0}' suffix and enable unsafe code

data.name: CustomMarshallerTypeMustHaveRequiredShapeTitle
data.value: Marshaller type does not have the required shape

data.name: ElementMarshallerCannotBeStatefulDescription
data.value: A marshaller for an element scenario cannot be stateful.

data.name: ElementMarshallerCannotBeStatefulMessage
data.value: The specified marshaller type '{0}' is a stateful marshaller, but stateful marshallers are not allowed in the provided marshal mode '{1}'

data.name: ElementTypesOfReturnTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The element type of the span returned by the first method must be the same type as the element type of the span returned by the second method.

data.name: ElementTypesOfReturnTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The element type of the span returned by '{0}' must be the same type as the element type of the span returned by '{1}'.

data.name: EntryPointTypeMustBeNonNullDescription
data.value: An entry-point type for marshalling a given type must not be 'null'.

data.name: EntryPointTypeMustBeNonNullMessage
data.value: The entry-point marshaller type for the type '{0}' must be not 'null'

data.name: EntryPointTypeMustHaveCustomMarshallerAttributeWithMatchingManagedTypeDescription
data.value: An entry-point type for marshalling a given type must have a 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' that specifies this type as the managed type.

data.name: EntryPointTypeMustHaveCustomMarshallerAttributeWithMatchingManagedTypeMessage
data.value: The entry-point marshaller type '{0}' for the type '{1}' must be a type with at least one 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' that specifies this type as the managed type

data.name: FirstParameterMustMatchReturnTypeDescription
data.value: The first parameter of the first method must be the same type as the return types of the second method.

data.name: FirstParameterMustMatchReturnTypeMessage
data.value: The first parameter of '{0}' must be the same type as the return type of '{1}'

data.name: FirstParametersMustMatchDescription
data.value: The first parameters of the two methods must be the same type.

data.name: FirstParametersMustMatchMessage
data.value: The first parameter of '{0}' and '{1}' must be the same type

data.name: FromUnmanagedOverloadsNotSupportedDescription
data.value: Overloading the 'FromUnmanaged' method is unuspported as some shapes are unable to distinguish between overloads.

data.name: FromUnmanagedOverloadsNotSupportedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' overloads the 'FromUnmanaged' method, which is not supported in custom marshallers

data.name: GeneratedComInterfaceStringMarshallingMustMatchBase
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' must match the base COM interface.

data.name: GenericEntryPointMarshallerTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityDescription
data.value: The marshaller type must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the emitted code can use a specific instantiation.

data.name: GenericEntryPointMarshallerTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a closed generic type, have the same arity as the managed type if it is a value marshaller, or have one additional generic parameter if it is a collection marshaller.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceReturnTypeBlittableDescription
data.value: The return type of 'GetPinnableReference' (after accounting for 'ref') must be blittable.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceReturnTypeBlittableMessage
data.value: The dereferenced type of the return type of the 'GetPinnableReference' method must be blittable

data.name: InstanceEventDeclaredInInterfaceDescription
data.value: Events are not a concept in COM, so no interop code will be source generated for instance events on source-generated COM interfaces.

data.name: InstanceEventDeclaredInInterfaceMessage
data.value: The instance event '{0}' is declared in the interface '{1}', which has the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' applied

data.name: InstanceEventDeclaredInInterfaceTitle
data.value: Declaring an instance event in a type with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' is not supported

data.name: InstancePropertyDeclaredInInterfaceDescription
data.value: Properties are not a concept in COM, so no interop code will be source generated for instance properties on source-generated COM interfaces.

data.name: InstancePropertyDeclaredInInterfaceMessage
data.value: The instance property '{0}' is declared in the interface '{1}', which has the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' applied

data.name: InstancePropertyDeclaredInInterfaceTitle
data.value: Declaring an instance property in a type with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' is not supported

data.name: InterfaceTypeNotSupportedMessage
data.value: Using 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' and 'InterfaceTypeAttribute' is not supported with 'ComInterfaceType' value '{0}'.

data.name: InterfaceTypeNotSupportedTitle
data.value: 'GeneratedComInterfaceType' does not support the 'ComInterfaceType' value supplied to 'InterfaceTypeAttribute' on the same type.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodContainingTypeMissingModifiersMessageLibraryImport
data.value: Method '{0}' is contained in a type '{1}' that is not marked 'partial'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodContainingTypeMissingModifiersMessageCom
data.value: Method '{0}' is contained in a type '{1}' that is not marked 'partial'. COM source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodContainingTypeMissingUnmanagedObjectUnwrapperAttributeMessage
data.value: Containing type of method with VirtualMethodIndexAttribute does not have a UnmanagedObjectUnwrapperAttribute.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodDescriptionLibraryImport
data.value: Methods marked with 'LibraryImportAttribute' should be 'static', 'partial', and non-generic. P/Invoke source generation will ignore methods that are non-'static', non-'partial', or generic.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodDescriptionCom
data.value: Methods on interfaces marked with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' should be non-generic. COM source generation will ignore methods that are generic.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodSignatureMessageLibraryImport
data.value: Method '{0}' should be 'static', 'partial', and non-generic when marked with 'LibraryImportAttribute'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodSignatureMessageCom
data.value: Method '{0}' should be non-generic when on interfaces marked with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'. COM source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidCustomMarshallerAttributeUsageTitle
data.value: Invalid 'CustomMarshallerAttribute' usage

data.name: InvalidExceptionMarshallingConfigurationDescription
data.value: The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' is invalid.

data.name: InvalidExceptionMarshallingConfigurationMessage
data.value: The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
data.comment: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

data.name: InvalidExceptionMarshallingConfigurationMissingCustomType
data.value: 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' must be specified when 'ExceptionMarshalling' is set to 'ExceptionMarshalling.Custom'.

data.name: InvalidExceptionMarshallingConfigurationNotCustom
data.value: 'ExceptionMarshalling' should be set to 'ExceptionMarshalling.Custom' when 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' is specified.

data.name: InvalidExceptionMarshallingValue
data.value: The provided value is not a known flag of the 'ExceptionMarshalling' enum.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComClassAttributeUsageDescription
data.value: Classes with 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' must implement one or more interfaces with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute', be marked partial, and be non-generic.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComClassAttributeUsageMissingPartialModifier
data.value: Class '{0}' with 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' or one of its containing types is not marked 'partial'.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComClassAttributeUsageTitle
data.value: Invalid 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' usage

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComInterfaceAttributeUsageDescription
data.value: Interfaces attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' must have 'public' or 'internal' accessibility and be partial, non-generic, and must specify a GUID with 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute'.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComInterfaceAttributeUsageInterfaceIsGeneric
data.value: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is generic.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComInterfaceAttributeUsageInterfaceNotAccessible
data.value: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is not accessible by generated code. The interface and all containing types must have accessibility 'internal' or 'public' for generated code to access it. {1}
data.comment: {1} is details about which type/containing type is not accessible

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComInterfaceAttributeUsageMissingGuidAttribute
data.value: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is missing 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute'.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComInterfaceAttributeUsageTitle
data.value: Invalid 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' usage.

data.name: InvalidGeneratedComInterfaceUsageMissingPartialModifier
data.value: The interface '{0}' or one of its containing types is missing the 'partial' keyword. Code will not be generated for '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidLibraryImportAttributeUsageTitle
data.value: Invalid 'LibraryImportAttribute' usage

data.name: InvalidManagedTypeTitle
data.value: Specified managed type is invalid

data.name: InvalidMarshallerTypeTitle
data.value: Specified marshaller type is invalid

data.name: InvalidMarshalModeTitle
data.value: Invalid 'MarshalMode' value.

data.name: InvalidNativeMarshallingAttributeUsageTitle
data.value: Invalid 'NativeMarshallingAttribute' usage

data.name: InvalidOptionsOnInterfaceDescription
data.value: The specified 'ComInterfaceOptions' are invalid.

data.name: InvalidOptionsOnInterfaceMessage
data.value: The specified 'ComInterfaceOptions' on '{0}' are invalid. {1}

data.name: InvalidSignaturesInMarshallerShapeTitle
data.value: Marshaller type has incompatible method signatures

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationDescription
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' is invalid.

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationMessageLibraryImport
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
data.comment: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationMissingCustomType
data.value: 'StringMarshallingCustomType' must be specified when 'StringMarshalling' is set to 'StringMarshalling.Custom'.

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationNotCustom
data.value: 'StringMarshalling' should be set to 'StringMarshalling.Custom' when 'StringMarshallingCustomType' is specified.

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationOnInterfaceMessage
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' on interface '{0}' is invalid. {1}

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationOnMethodMessage
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
data.comment: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

data.name: InvalidVirtualMethodIndexAttributeUsage
data.value: Invalid 'VirtualMethodIndexAttribute' usage

data.name: LinearCollectionElementTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The element type of the 'ReadOnlySpan' returned by 'GetManagedValuesSource' must be the same as the element type returned by 'GetManagedValuesDestination'.

data.name: LinearCollectionElementTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The element type of the 'ReadOnlySpan' returned by 'GetManagedValuesSource' must be the same as the element type returned by 'GetManagedValuesDestination'

data.name: LinearCollectionInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature must provide a three-parameter constructor taking the managed type as the first parameter, a 'Span<byte>' as the second parameter, and the native size of the element as the third parameter

data.name: LinearCollectionInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling with the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature for '{1}' but does not provide a three-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' , a 'Span<byte>', and an 'int'

data.name: LinearCollectionInRequiresCollectionMethodsDescription
data.value: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that returns a 'Span<>'.

data.name: LinearCollectionInRequiresCollectionMethodsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that returns a 'Span<>'

data.name: LinearCollectionOutRequiresCollectionMethodsDescription
data.value: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes an 'int' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'.

data.name: LinearCollectionOutRequiresCollectionMethodsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes an 'int' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'

data.name: ManagedTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityDescription
data.value: The marshaller type must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the generator can determine which methods are available on the specific marshaller types.

data.name: ManagedTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityMessage
data.value: The managed type '{0}' for entry-point marshaller type '{1}' must be a closed generic type, have the same arity as the managed type if it is a value marshaller, or have one additional generic parameter if it is a collection marshaller.

data.name: ManagedTypeMustBeNonNullDescription
data.value: The managed type for a custom marshaller must be non-null.

data.name: ManagedTypeMustBeNonNullMessage
data.value: The managed type for the entry-point marshaller type '{0}' must not be 'null'

data.name: MarshalAsConfigurationNotSupportedMessageParameterLibraryImport
data.value: The specified 'MarshalAsAttribute' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.

data.name: MarshalAsConfigurationNotSupportedMessageParameterCom
data.value: The specified 'MarshalAsAttribute' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

data.name: MarshalAsConfigurationNotSupportedMessageReturnLibraryImport
data.value: The specified 'MarshalAsAttribute' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular 'DllImport' instead.

data.name: MarshalAsConfigurationNotSupportedMessageReturnCom
data.value: The specified 'MarshalAsAttribute' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityDescription
data.value: The marshaller type must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the emitted code can use a specific instantiation.

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' pointed to by the entry-point marshaller type '{1}' must be a closed generic type or have the same arity as the managed type

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeNonNullDescription
data.value: The 'marshallerType' parameter in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.CustomMarshallerAttribute' cannot be 'null'.

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeNonNullMessage
data.value: The 'marshallerType' parameter in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.CustomMarshallerAttribute' cannot be 'null'

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeStaticClassOrStructDescription
data.value: A marshaller type must either be a stateless static class or a stateful value type. A non-static class is not allowed.

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustBeStaticClassOrStructMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' must be a static class or a value type

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustSpecifyManagedTypeDescription
data.value: A type with a 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' must specify a non-'null' managed type

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustSpecifyManagedTypeMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' does not specify a managed type in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerAttribute' applied to the type

data.name: MarshalModeMustBeValidEnumValue
data.value: The 'marshalMode' argument of 'CustomMarshallerAttribute' must be a valid enum value of 'MarshalMode'.

data.name: MethodNotDeclaredInAttributedInterfaceDescription
data.value: All methods must be declared in the same partial definition of a 'GeneratedComInterface'-attributed interface type to ensure reliable calculation for virtual method table offsets.

data.name: MethodNotDeclaredInAttributedInterfaceMessage
data.value: The method '{0}' is declared on a different partial definition of the interface '{1}' than the definition that has the 'GeneratedComInterface' attribute

data.name: MethodNotDeclaredInAttributedInterfaceTitle
data.value: Method is declared in different partial declaration than the 'GeneratedComInterface' attribute.

data.name: MultipleComInterfaceBaseTypesDescription
data.value: A 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interface can only derive from at most one other 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interface.

data.name: MultipleComInterfaceBaseTypesMessage
data.value: Interface '{0}' is derived from two or more interfaces attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'.

data.name: MultipleComInterfaceBaseTypesTitle
data.value: Specified interface derives from two or more 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interfaces.

data.name: OneWrapperMustBeGenerated
data.value: Either 'ComInterfaceOptions.ManagedObjectWrapper' or 'ComInterfaceOptions.ComObjectWrapper' must be specified.

data.name: OutRequiresToManagedDescription
data.value: A 'Value' or 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction must provide a 'ToManaged' method that returns the managed type.

data.name: OutRequiresToManagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies it supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction, but it does not provide a 'ToManaged' method that returns the managed type

data.name: RequiresAllowUnsafeBlocksDescriptionLibraryImport
data.value: LibraryImportAttribute requires unsafe code. Project must be updated with '<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>'.

data.name: RequiresAllowUnsafeBlocksDescriptionCom
data.value: 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' and 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' require unsafe code. Project must be updated with '<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>'.

data.name: RequiresAllowUnsafeBlocksMessageLibraryImport
data.value: LibraryImportAttribute requires unsafe code. Project must be updated with '<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>'.

data.name: RequiresAllowUnsafeBlocksMessageCom
data.value: 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' and 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' require unsafe code. Project must be updated with '<AllowUnsafeBlocks>true</AllowUnsafeBlocks>'.

data.name: RequiresAllowUnsafeBlocksTitleLibraryImport
data.value: LibraryImportAttribute requires unsafe code.

data.name: RequiresAllowUnsafeBlocksTitleCom
data.value: 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' and 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' require unsafe code.

data.name: ReturnTypeMustBeExpectedTypeDescription
data.value: The return type the two method must be the expected type.

data.name: ReturnTypeMustBeExpectedTypeMessage
data.value: The return type of '{0}' must be '{1}'

data.name: ReturnTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The return types of the two methods must be the same type.

data.name: ReturnTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The return type of '{0}' must be the same type as the return type of '{1}'

data.name: RuntimeComApisDoNotSupportSourceGeneratedComDescription
data.value: COM Interop APIs on 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal' do not support source-generated COM and will fail at runtime

data.name: RuntimeComApisDoNotSupportSourceGeneratedComMessage
data.value: The method '{0}' only supports runtime-based COM interop and will not work with type '{1}'

data.name: RuntimeComApisDoNotSupportSourceGeneratedComTitle
data.value: COM Interop APIs on 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal' do not support source-generated COM

data.name: SizeOfCollectionMustBeKnownAtMarshalTimeTitle
data.value: The size of a collection that is marshalled to the callee must be defined when the method is called.

data.name: SizeOfCollectionMustBeKnownAtMarshalTimeMessageOutParam
data.value: The size of parameter '{0}' that is marshalled to the callee must be defined when the method is called, but count parameter '{1}' is an 'out' parameter.

data.name: SizeOfCollectionMustBeKnownAtMarshalTimeMessageReturnValue
data.value: The size of parameter '{0}' that is marshalled to the callee must be defined when the method is called, but the return value is used as the size of the collection.

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresFreeDescription
data.value: A stateful marshaller must have a zero-parameter void-returning instance method named 'Free'.

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresFreeMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' is a stateful marshaller and does not have a zero-parameter void-returning instance method named 'Free'

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresFromManagedDescription
data.value: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'FromManaged' instance method that takes the managed value as a parameter and returns 'void'.

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresFromManagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a one-parameter instance method named 'FromManaged' that takes a '{2}' as a parameter and returns 'void'

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresFromUnmanagedDescription
data.value: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'FromUnmanaged' instance method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns 'void'.

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresFromUnmanagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a one-parameter instance method named 'FromUnmanaged' that takes the 'unmanaged' value as a parameter and returns 'void'

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresToManagedDescription
data.value: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'ToManaged' instance method that takes no parameters and returns the managed type.

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresToManagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a zero-parameter instance method named 'ToManaged' that returns '{2}'

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresToUnmanagedDescription
data.value: A stateful marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'ToUnmanaged' instance method that takes no parameters and returns the 'unmanaged' type.

data.name: StatefulMarshallerRequiresToUnmanagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but it does not provide a zero-parameter instance method named 'ToUnmanaged' that returns the 'unmanaged' type for the marshaller

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionCallerAllocFromManagedMustHaveBufferSizeDescription
data.value: When the 'Managed to Unmanaged with Caller-Allocated Buffer' shape is used by providing an 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method that takes a 'Span<T>' on the marshaller type, the type must provide a static 'BufferSize' property to provide the number of elements in the caller-allocated buffer.

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionCallerAllocFromManagedMustHaveBufferSizeMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' must have a static read-only 'int' 'BufferSize' property to specify the size of the caller-allocated buffer because it has an 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method that takes a caller-allocated 'Span<{1}>'

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionInRequiresCollectionMethodsDescription
data.value: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that takes the managed value as a parameter and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns a 'Span<>'

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionInRequiresCollectionMethodsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that takes '{2}' as a parameter and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesDestination' method that takes the unmanaged value as a parameter and returns a 'Span<>'

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionOutRequiresCollectionMethodsDescription
data.value: A contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes the managed value and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes the unmanaged value and an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'.

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionOutRequiresCollectionMethodsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes '{2}' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetUnmanagedValuesSource' method that takes the unmanaged value and an 'int' and returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>'

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionRequiresTwoParameterAllocateContainerForManagedElementsDescription
data.value: A stateless contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide an 'AllocateContainerForManagedElements' method taking the unmanaged type as the first parameter and the number of elements as an 'int' parameter

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionRequiresTwoParameterAllocateContainerForManagedElementsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but does not provide a two-parameter 'AllocateContainerForManagedElements' method that takes the unmanaged type as the first parameter and an 'int' as the second parameter

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionRequiresTwoParameterAllocateContainerForUnmanagedElementsDescription
data.value: A stateless contiguous collection marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide an 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method taking the managed type as the first parameter and providing the number of elements as an 'out int' parameter

data.name: StatelessLinearCollectionRequiresTwoParameterAllocateContainerForUnmanagedElementsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but does not provide a two-parameter 'AllocateContainerForUnmanagedElements' method that takes a '{2}' as the first parameter and an 'out int' as the second parameter

data.name: StatelessRequiresConvertToManagedDescription
data.value: A stateless value marshaller that supports marshalling from unmanaged to managed must provide a 'ConvertToManaged' method that takes the unmanaged type as a parameter and returns the the managed type.

data.name: StatelessRequiresConvertToManagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies it supports the '{1}' marshal mode, but it does not provide a 'ConvertToManaged' method that takes the unmanaged type as a parameter and returns '{2}'

data.name: StatelessValueInRequiresConvertToUnmanagedDescription
data.value: A stateless value marshaller that supports marshalling from managed to unmanaged must provide a one-parameter 'ConvertToUnmanaged' method that takes the managed value as the parameter and returns a value of the 'unmanaged' type.

data.name: StatelessValueInRequiresConvertToUnmanagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports the '{1}' marshal mode for '{2}' but does not provide a one-parameter 'ConvertToUnmanaged' method that takes a '{2}' as a parameter and returns a value of an 'unmanaged' type

data.name: StringMarshallingCustomTypeNotAccessibleByGeneratedCode
data.value: The type '{0}' specified as 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute.StringMarshallingCustomType' is not accessible by generated code. The type must have at least 'internal' accessibility. {1}
data.comment: {1} is details about which type/containing type is not accessible

data.name: ToFromUnmanagedTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The return type of 'ToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'FromUnmanaged' must be the same.

data.name: ToFromUnmanagedTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The return type of 'ToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'FromUnmanaged' must be the same

data.name: ToUnmanagedFromManagedTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The return type of 'ConvertToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'ConvertToManaged' must be the same.

data.name: ToUnmanagedFromManagedTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The return type of 'ConvertToUnmanaged' and the parameter type of 'ConvertToManaged' must be the same

data.name: TypeMustBeUnmanagedDescription
data.value: The unmanaged type for a custom marshaller must be a C# unmanaged type.

data.name: TypeMustBeUnmanagedMessage
data.value: The return type of '{0}' must be unmanaged

data.name: TypeMustHaveExplicitCastFromVoidPointerDescription
data.value: 'void*' must be castable to the type so the pinned result of the static 'GetPinnableReference' method can be passed to the native context after being pinned.

data.name: TypeMustHaveExplicitCastFromVoidPointerMessage
data.value: 'void*' must be castable to the type '{0}' because the managed type '{1}' has a static 'GetPinnableReference' method

data.name: TypeNotSupportedDescriptionLibraryImport
data.value: For types that are not supported by source-generated P/Invokes, the resulting P/Invoke will rely on the underlying runtime to marshal the specified type.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedDescriptionCom
data.value: For types that are not supported by source-generated COM, the resulting function pointer will rely on the underlying runtime to marshal the specified type.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameterLibraryImport
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameterCom
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated COM. The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameterWithDetails
data.value: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the parameter

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturnLibraryImport
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturnCom
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated COM. The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturnWithDetails
data.value: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the method

data.name: TypeNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Specified type is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes

data.name: TypeNotSupportedTitleCom
data.value: Specified type is not supported by source-generated COM

data.name: UnnecessaryMarshallingInfoDescription
data.value: Unnecesssary marshalling info was provided. This marshalling information can be removed without any change in behavior to the application.

data.name: UnnecessaryMarshallingInfoTitle
data.value: Unnecessary marshalling info was provided and can be removed.

data.name: UnnecessaryParameterMarshallingInfoMessage
data.value: Unnecessary marshalling info '{0}' was provided for parameter '{1}'. {2}

data.name: UnnecessaryReturnMarshallingInfoMessage
data.value: Unnecessary marshalling info '{0}' was provided for the return type of method '{1}'. {2}

data.name: ValueInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'Value'-kind native type that supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature must provide a two-parameter constructor taking the managed type and a 'Span' of an 'unmanaged' type as parameters

data.name: ValueInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling with the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature for '{1}' but does not provide a two-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' and 'Span' of an 'unmanaged' type as parameters

data.name: ValueInRequiresOneParameterConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'Value'-kind native type must provide a one-parameter constructor taking the managed type as a parameter

data.name: ValueInRequiresOneParameterConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling of '{1}' but does not provide a one-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' as a parameter

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationMessageCom
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' on interface '{0}' is invalid. {1}
data.comment: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

data.name: InOutAttributes
data.value: [In] and [Out] attributes

data.name: OutAttributeNotSupportedOnByValueParameters
data.value: The '[Out]' attribute is only supported on array parameters. Consider using 'out' or 'ref' keywords to make the parameter mutable.

data.name: InAttributeNotSupportedOnByValueParameters
data.value: The '[In]' attribute is only supported on array parameters. By-value parameters are considered read-only by default.

data.name: InOutAttributeNotSupportedOnByValueParameters
data.value: The '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes are only supported on array parameters. Consider using the 'ref' keyword to make the parameter mutable.

data.name: ComMethodReturningIntWillBeOutParameterMessage
data.value: The return value in the managed definition will be converted to an 'out' parameter when calling the unmanaged COM method. If the return value is intended to be the HRESULT code returned by the unmanaged COM method, use '[PreserveSig]' on the method.

data.name: ComMethodReturningIntWillBeOutParameterTitle
data.value: The return value in the managed definition will be converted to an additional 'out' parameter at the end of the parameter list when calling the unmanaged COM method.

data.name: HResultTypeWillBeTreatedAsStructMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' will be treated as a struct in the native signature, not as a native HRESULT. To treat this as an HRESULT, add '[return:MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Error)]' to the method.

data.name: HResultTypeWillBeTreatedAsStructTitle
data.value: This type will be treated as a struct in the native signature, not as a native HRESULT

data.name: PreferExplicitInOutAttributesOnArrays
data.value: It is recommended to use explicit '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes on array parameters.

data.name: ComInterfaceUsageDoesNotFollowBestPracticesTitle
data.value: The usage of 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' does not follow recommendations.

data.name: ComInterfaceUsageDoesNotFollowBestPracticesMessageWithDetails
data.value: The usage of 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' does not follow recommendations. {0}

data.name: LibraryImportUsageDoesNotFollowBestPracticesTitle
data.value: The usage of 'LibraryImportAttribute' does not follow recommendations.

data.name: LibraryImportUsageDoesNotFollowBestPracticesMessageWithDetails
data.value: The usage of 'LibraryImportAttribute' does not follow recommendations. {0}

data.name: InVariantShouldBeRef
data.value: Objects marshalled from VARIANTs as 'in' parameters in unmanaged-to-managed calls will not propagate back the updated result, even if the VARIANT is a VT_BYREF variant. Use a 'ref' parameter instead of an 'in' parameter to propagate the updated value back to the caller.
